original_text: Lot lived among those bad people. Every day, he saw the bad things that they did. Every day, he heard the bad things that they said. As a result, Lot had much trouble in his mind, because he was a good man.
korean_text: (이는 이 의인이 그들 중에 거하여 날마다 저 불법한 행실을 보고 들음으로 그 의로운 심령이 상함이라)

sentences.original_text: Lot lived among those bad people.
sentences.korean_translation: 롯은 그 악한 사람들 속에서 살았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Every day, he saw the bad things that they did.
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 그는 그들이 하는 악한 일들을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Every day, he heard the bad things that they said.
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 그는 그들이 하는 악한 말들을 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: As a result, Lot had much trouble in his mind.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 롯은 마음에 많은 고통을 받았습니다.

sentences.original_text: because he was a good man.
